location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 92 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '48'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View across 'Maidan-i-Naftan' [Maidan-i-Naftūn], the oil fields near Masjed Soleymān. A number of structures can be seen along the distant horizon, while in the middle-ground a river valley runs from left to centre.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: 'Maidan-i-Naftan'Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘48’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(April 1917)’
